creator: 137 Innovation
descriptionHtml:
• Quix app allows you to create your own quiz room.
• Here you can create the quiz by providing questions and options.
• You can share the Quiz room's ID and password to others to join the quiz created by you.
• Users can join the quiz using shared information.
• Malpractices like opening multiple windows, taking screenshots, pressing Home button will cause auto submission of test. This will prevents the cheating during the test.
• Screen recording is also not allowed during test.
• Result is displayed after submitting the quiz.
• User can exit from the quiz room.

• Quiz Creator can view the result and share it for further use.
• The result is in .xls (Excel) format.
• Only Creator can view the results of all the users
• Creator can delete the test as well as quiz room created by him.
• After deleted by Quiz creator, it will not be visible to the user any more.
descriptionShort: Create & Join Quiz room. Share it & conduct the Quiz test. Prevent Malpractices

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Here you can Create and Join Quiz Room to conduct quiz as well as It prevent user to do malpractice at quiz such as, Opening other application , pressing home button , etc will cause in Auto submission of quiz.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Here you can Create and Join Quiz Room to conduct quiz as well as It prevents users to do malpractice at quizzes such as, Opening other applications, pressing the home button, etc will cause the Auto submission of the quiz.

New public rooms feature added. Here you can join any public room and explore more about the app and its features

Now you can create a quiz using a web app also at https://quix.online/
